title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI at the speed of news: Bloomberg Media’s vision for the future (IND3331)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 新闻速度的AI：彭博媒体对未来的愿景 (IND3331)
abstract: Discover Bloomberg’s vision for an AI-driven content pipeline designed to transform natural-language queries and multimodal inputs into video content. This session outlines how Bloomberg aims to unify high-speed discovery and content assembly across audio, video, and text using semantic search patterns, OpenSearch, and Amazon Neptune. Learn how Bloomberg is shaping an approach that balances AI acceleration with human oversight — preserving accuracy and integrity while enabling more dynamic, real-time news experiences. The discussion will explore dynamically weighting data sources, tuning vector types, and using LLM-powered user intent analysis to achieve scalable, precise multimodal retrieval and content recommendations in workflows.
abstract_cn: 探索彭博社对AI驱动内容管道的愿景，该管道旨在将自然语言查询和多模态输入转化为视频内容。本次会议概述了彭博社如何通过语义搜索模式、OpenSearch和Amazon Neptune统一实现跨音频、视频和文本的高速发现和内容组装。了解彭博社如何塑造一种平衡AI加速与人工监督的方法——在保持准确性和完整性的同时，实现更动态、实时的新闻体验。讨论将探讨动态加权数据源、调优向量类型，以及使用LLM驱动的用户意图分析，以在工作流程中实现可扩展、精确的多模态检索和内容推荐。
